scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch src/  -e 'js, html, vue' --exec 'npm run build-dev; babel-node src/server/server.js'
scripts.build-dev: npm run init-dev; webpack --config webpack.build.dev.js; cp src/ui/index.html public/
scripts.start-dev-demo: NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch src/  -e 'js, html, vue' --exec 'npm run build-dev-demo; babel-node src/server/server.js'
scripts.build-dev-demo: npm run init-dev; webpack --config webpack.build.dev.demo.js; cp src/ui/index.html public/; cp -r static-demo/public-images public/
scripts.init-dist: mkdir -p dist; rm -rf dist/*; cp -r public/* dist/.
scripts.build-static-demo: npm run init-dist; webpack --config webpack.demo.js; cp src/ui/index.html dist/; cp static-demo/scheme-preview-images/* dist/images/.
